did.abstract: Subsidiary of Russ Manufacturing Company, Cleveland Ohio, maker of food service equipment. Collection includes sales brochures, specification and price sheets for various soda fountain models, information on manufacturing, operation and pitches on how to promote soda fountain service in drug stores and restaurants. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
